inclusion.criterion: Body Mass Index >35 with comorbidity (Type 2 Mellitus Diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, bronchial asthma, osteoarthritis)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent diagnosis of malignancy, inflammatory bowel disease, Barrett ́s esophagus, and GERD with esophagitis scored as or greater than grade B, a large hiatal hernia (>3 cm)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. The baby boy is a first child who was born at the age of 38 weeks with NVD from a healthy mother.
